column21: To the Shareholder of M-tec Trackunit A/S
column23: The Annual Report is prepared in accordance with the Danish Financial Statements Act.
column24: In our opinion the Financial Statements give a true and fair view of the financial position at 31 December 2016 of the Company and of the results of the Company operations for 2016.
column27: The share capital consists of 500,000 shares of a nominal value of TDKK 1. No shares carry any special rights.
column28: Current tax liabilities and receivables are recognised in the balance sheet as the expected taxable income for the year adjusted for tax on taxable incomes for prior years and tax paid on account. Extra payments and repayment under the on-account taxation scheme are recognised in the income statement in financial income and expenses.
column29: Dividend distribution proposed by Management for the year is disclosed as a separate equity item.
column30: Amortisation, depreciation and impairment losses comprise amortisation, depreciation and impairment of intangible assets and property, plant and equipment.
column31: Investments which are not traded in an active market are measured at the lower of cost and recoverable amount.
column32: Expenses for raw materials and consumables comprise the raw materials and consumables consumed to achieve revenue for the enterprice.
column33: Prepayments comprise prepaid expenses concerning rent, insurance premiums, subscriptions and interest.
column34: Deferred income comprises payments received in respect of income in subsequent years.
column35: Staff expenses comprise wages and salaries as well as payroll expenses.
column36: Other external expenses comprise indirect production costs and expenses for premises, sales and distribution as well as office expenses, etc.
column37: Financial income and expenses are recognised in the income statement at the amounts relating to the financial year.
column38: With reference to section 32 of the Danish Financial Statements Act, revenue has not been disclosed in the Annual Report.
column39: The item âIncome from investments in subsidiariesâ in the income statement includes the proportionate share of the profit for the year.
column40: Other fixed asset investments consist of deposit.
column41: Other operating income and other operating expenses comprise items of a secondary nature to the main activities of the Company, including gains and losses on the sale of intangible assets and property, plant and equipment.
column42: Receivables are recognised in the balance sheet at amortised cost, which substantially corresponds to nominal value. Provisions for estimated bad debts are made.
column43: We conducted our audit in accordance with International Standards on Auditing (ISAs) and the additional requirements applicable in Denmark. Our responsibilities under those standards and requirements are further described in the âAuditorâs responsibilities for the audit of the Financial Statementsâ section of our report. We are independent of the Company in accordance with the International Ethics Standards Board for Accountantsâ Code of Ethics for Professional Accountants (IESBA Code) and the additional requirements applicable in Denmark, and we have fulfilled our other ethical responsibilities in accordance with these requirements. We believe that the audit evidence we have obtained is sufficient and appropriate to provide a basis for our opinion.
column44: Deferred income consists of payments received in respect of income in subsequent years.
column46: With reference to section 86(4) of the Danish Financial Statements Act and to the cash flow statement included in the consolidated financial statements of M-Tec Holding Danmark ApS, the Company has not prepared a cash flow statement.
column47: Prepayments consist of prepaid expenses concerning rent, insurance premiums, subscriptions and interest as well.
column52: The Executive Board and Board of Directors have today considered and adopted the Annual Report of M-tec Trackunit A/S for the financial year 1 January - 31 December 2016.
column53: We have audited the Financial Statements of M-tec Trackunit A/S for the financial year 1 January - 31 December 2016, which comprise income statement, balance sheet, statement of changes in equity and notes, including a summary of significant accounting policies (âthe Financial Statementsâ).
column54: With reference to section 112 of the Danish Financial Statements Act and to the consolidated financial statements of M-Tec Holding Danmark ApS, the Company has not prepared consolidated financial statements.
column60: In our opinion, the Financial Statements give a true and fair view of the financial position of the Company at 31 December 2016 and of the results of the Companyâs operations for the financial year 1 January - 31 December 2016 in accordance with the Danish Financial Statements Act.
column64: We recommend that the Annual Report be adopted at the Annual General Meeting.
column75: Development projects relate to development of products that are expected to sellable in a short period of time.
